mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_custom ( menu_code, menu_name, user_id, menu_title, menu_option, file_originalName, file_upname) VALUES (#{menu_code}, #{menu_name}, #{user_id}, #{menu_title}, #{menu_option}, #{file_originalName}, #{file_upname} )
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tbl_custom( menu_seq, menu_code, user_id, menu_title, menu_name, menu_option) VALUES( #{menu_seq}, #{menu_code}, #{user_id}, #{menu_title}, #{menu_option} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE menu_code = #{menu_code}, menu_name = #{menu_name}, user_id = #{user_id}, menu_title = #{menu_title}, menu_option = #{menu_option}, file_originalName = #{file_originalName}, file_upname = #{file_upname}

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_custom( menu_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, menu_code BIGINT NOT NULL, menu_name VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, user_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, menu_title VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, menu_option VARCHAR(256), file_originalName VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, file_upname VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL )
